name: NFCTagReaderSessionDelegate
desc: A protocol that an object implements to receive callbacks sent from an NFC tag reader session.

items.name: func tagReaderSessionDidBecomeActive(NFCTagReaderSession)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the reader session is active.

items.name: func tagReaderSession(NFCTagReaderSession, didDetect: [NFCTag])
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the session detected NFC tags.

items.name: func tagReaderSession(NFCTagReaderSession, didInvalidateWithError: Error)
items.desc: Tells the delegate the reason for invalidating a reader session.
